Title: Gov. Yusuf resigned from Kwankwasiya Movement, not NNPP, says founder
Summary: Aniebonam argued that the resignation letter from the governor was not addressed to the NNPP authentic National Working Committee (NWC) led by Dr Major Agbo .

Title: Swiatek survives roller coaster to reach Australian Open last 16
Summary: Six-time major champion Iga Swiatek endured a roller-coaster ride before sealing her place in the Australian Open last 16 on Saturday .

Title: Otti promises automatic employment for outstanding NYSC members in Abia
Summary: Governor Alex Otti has assured NYSC members serving in Abia State of automatic employment if they distinguish themselves during their service year . Otti promises automatic employment for outstanding NYSC member .

Title: Shettima returns to Abuja after trips to Guinea-Conakry, Switzerland
Summary: Shettima arrived at the Nnamdi Azikiwe International Airport on Saturday after representing President Bola Tinubu at the inauguration of Guinea’s President, Mamadi Doumbouya .

Title: Naomi Osaka pulls out of Australian Open injured
Summary: Naomi Osaka pulls out of Australian Open injured . The Japanese superstar made the announcement just hours before she was due to meet Australian qualifier Maddison Inglis on centre court in Melbourne .

Title: VIDEO: Shettima returns after international economic mission in Davos, Guinea
Summary: Vice President Kashim Shettima has returned to Abuja following a week-long diplomatic and economic mission to Guinea-Conakry and Switzerland . He said Nigeria has “reclaimed a frontline seat in global and regional policy conversations” The Vice President said it demonstrates Nigeria’s renewed commitment to regional solidarity .

Title: Illness, pregnancy delayed my song with Chike — Singer Simi
Summary: Popular singer, Simisola Kosoko, aka Simi, has revealed that health and personal challenges delayed the release of her song ‘Where You Dey’ featuring fellow artiste, Chike . In a statement shared on her X (formerly Twitter) page on Friday, Simi said she had planned to release the track

Title: VIDEO: Asian man recounts how Police complaint unit helped recover N150,000 extorted by officer
Summary: Police Complaint Response Unit helped recover N150,000 allegedly extorted from a man in Lagos . The man was heading to a bar with a friend to watch a football match when he was stopped by police officers . He said he did not have his passport with him at the time, but was forced to hand over the money .

Title: Police arrest seven over N20m beverage theft in Ondo
Summary: The Ondo State Police Command has arrested seven suspects in connection with a conspiracy and theft case involving goods valued at ₦20.45 million from a commercial store in Ore, Odigbo Local Government Area . Title: UI emerges best Nigerian university in Law, Medicine
Summary: The University of Ibadan has emerged as the best Nigerian university in both law and medicine . UI and the University of Nigeria, Nsukka made the 301–400 band, marking Nigeria’s presence among 425 top global law schools .
